querystring.select: SELECT b.APP_NO AS AppNo, b.APP_ID AS AppId, a.APP_CUST_ID AS AppCustId, a.APPLICANT_NO AS ApplicantNo, a.CUST_NO AS CustNo, a.CUST_NAME AS CustName, d.DESCR AS IdTypeDescr, a.ID_NO AS IdNo, a.TAX_ID_NO AS TaxIdNo, c.ESTABLISHMENT_DT AS EstablishmentDt, CASE WHEN a.IS_CUSTOMER = 1 THEN 'CUSTOMER' WHEN a.IS_GUARANTOR = 1 THEN 'GUARANTOR' WHEN a.IS_FAMILY = 1 THEN 'FAMILY' WHEN a.IS_SHAREHOLDER = 1 THEN 'SHARE HOLDER' ELSE '' END AS SubjectType
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST a WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP b WITH (NOLOCK) ON a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.APP_CUST_ID = a.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER d WITH (NOLOCK) ON d.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ID_TYPE' AND d.MASTER_CODE = a.MR_ID_TYPE_CODE
